play(address,bytes32,address,bytes).details: This emits when the obligation of debt change.

params._data: If the first uint256 its 0: its a deposit, the second uint256 is the amount of the deposit Otherwise, the first uint256 is the amount of the bet, the second id the possibility and the third is the option(lucky number)
params._id: Id of the bet on gambling manager
params._player: The bet player, the win amount will send of this

transferTo(address).details: Transfers the ownership of the contract.
